hero.title: I'M Gunawan Setia Wiguna
hero.paragraph: My role is a front-end developer. This website is the first of my portfolio as a front-end Developer.

works.title: Tanya Hadis Bot
works.paragraph: Tanya Hadis Bot is my final campus project. To access the bot, use Telegram apps and search the id bot: @TanyaHadisBot.

works.title: Tabel Siswa SMA
works.paragraph: The website is the result of my learning about react-redux with CRUD table (Create, Read, Update, and Delete). This website use mui-material (react component library) and Axios & Fetch to get API from dummyjson.com.
